Posts.Content: I had a single mastectomy 18 months ago and am currently on waiting list for DIEP reconstruction. I love wearing strapless and camisole tops so have bought the Barbara strapless bra by Amoena. It comes in black and flesh colour.  It’s ok, not as comfortable as my previous bras because it’s quite moulded. In fact on holiday last year, I realised when I was out that I’d forgotten to put my prosthesis in and you couldn’t even tell! It’s worth ordering one and trying it out. I can’t wait to be able to wear normal bras again though I have to say.
Posts.Title: Wearing a strapless bra after mastectomy
